quote: Make it a rule that I have to prospect at least one person a day.
why_clipworthy: It provides a simple, actionable tactic for consistent prospecting.
suggested_hook: Struggling with prospecting? Here's a simple daily habit to boost your leads.

quote: I don't try any new marketing tactics until the fourth quarter of the year.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the idea of constant marketing experimentation.
suggested_hook: Why you should stop experimenting with marketing all year round.
